body_html: @abdasgupta , I am also using Nvidia Driver Version: 361.10. From line export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/lib/nvidia-375/ && \ and docker run it seems that you are using the new 375 driver. Could you try and downgrade to 361.10?
body_text: @abdasgupta , I am also using  Nvidia  Driver Version: 361.10. From line export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/lib/nvidia-375/ && \ and docker run it seems that you are using the new 375 driver. Could you try and downgrade to 361.10?
body: @abdasgupta , I am also using  Nvidia  Driver Version: 361.10. From line `export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/lib/nvidia-375/ && \` and `docker run` it seems that you are using the new 375 driver. Could you try and downgrade to 361.10?
